pages.text: $(thing)Foxhounds$() are a $(thing)Hostile$() type of Fire Elemental, native to the $(thing)Nether$(). They can be found commonly throughout the $(thing)Nether$().$(br2)They can be $(thing)Tamed$() by feeding them $(item)Coal$() while you are under the effects of a $(item)Fire Resistance Potion$().$(br)Tamed $(thing)Foxhounds$() will speed up any $(item)Furnace$() they sit on.
